channel.title: Suspend on Gharib Personal Blog

item.title: Chinese government suspends the Alibaba deal because it did not share the 0-day of Log4j with the government.
item.description:
The Ministry of Industry and Information Technology (MIIT) of China temporarily suspended a partnership with Alibaba Cloud, the cloud computing subsidiary of the worldâ€™s largest e-commerce company, for six months after the company failed to promptly notify the government about a critical security vulnerability affecting the widely used Log4j logging library.

Reports from 21st Century Business Herald, a Chinese daily business newspaper, revealed the development to Reuters and South China Morning Post.
